About

Welcome to my site! I am a Mechanical Engineering/Robotics Ph.D. researcher, specializing in nonlinear optimization, control theory, dynamics, machine learning, and numerical methods. I have extensive research, leadership, and teaching experience with a rigorous mathematical background and hands-on experience with robotic fish. I am an enthusiastic team player with an interest in the nexus of science, research, and business-management.
